front.title: IP6 ULAs with UUID Interface Identifiers (ULA-UUID)

abstract.t: Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) defines a Unique Local IPv6 Unicast Address (ULA) format based on the IANA-assigned prefix fc00::/7. The structure for sub-prefix fd00::/8 is well defined, but the remaining sub-prefix fc00::/8 is reserved for future use. This document proposes a use for sub-prefix fc00::/8 in conjunction with the Universally Unique Interface IDentifier (UUID).
